mapper.select: /* account.findListDormantAccountForAllUser */ SELECT A.USR_ID ,A.USR_NM ,A.EML , VDGL.VD_CD , VDGL.VD_NM FROM USR A INNER JOIN USR_ACCT_SEC_RULE B ON A.TEN_ID = B.TEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN VD VDGL ON VDGL.TEN_ID = A.TEN_ID AND VDGL.VD_CD = A.VD_CD WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM >= #{p.notic_day} AND A.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM < #{p.notic_one_day} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* account.findListDormantAccountForSupplier */ SELECT A.USR_ID ,A.USR_NM ,A.EML , VDGL.VD_CD , VDGL.VD_NM FROM USR A INNER JOIN USR_ACCT_SEC_RULE B ON A.TEN_ID = B.TEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN VD VDGL ON VDGL.TEN_ID = A.TEN_ID AND VDGL.VD_CD = A.VD_CD WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM >= #{p.notic_day} AND A.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM < #{p.notic_one_day} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USR_TYP_CCD ='VD'
